channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
Can anyone help me use the following code, [code]int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(castOnItem, 0,castOnSlot)); [/code]
but instead of using it for the castonitem use it to find the shop value of each item equipped, (IE, Body, Legs, etc.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Can anyone help me use the following code,

int alchvaluez = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(castOnItem, 0,castOnSlot));

but instead of using it for the castonitem use it to find the shop value of each item equipped, (IE, Body, Legs, etc.
